Technical description: Not exported ("ODF Converter" put in Properties/Application)
dc:title in both
dc:description in both
dc:subject in both
Merged all meta:keyword elemnts into a single space separated list within cp:keywords
meta:initial-creator converted to dc:creator
dc:creator converted to cp:lastModifiedBy
meta:creation-date converted to dcterms:created
dc:date converted to dcterms:modified (only if exists)
meta:editing-cycles converted to cp:revision

meta:document-statistic/@meta:page-count converted to Pages
meta:document-statistic/@meta:word-count converted to Words
meta:document-statistic/@meta:paragraph-count converted to Paragraphs
meta:document-statistic/@meta:character-count converted to CharactersWithSpaces
Each @meta:name is converted to a property with type corresponding to String (using {D5CDD505-2E9C-101B-9397-08002B2CF9AE} as fmtid)
Comment: Other formats should be treated as well

Feature: Headings, Paragraphs and Basic Text Structure

Technical description:
text:h is converted to a w:document/w:body/w:p paragraph.
text:h/@text:outline-level is translated to w:p/w:pPr/w:outLineLvi
text:p is converted to w:document/w:body/w:p
text:p/@text:style-name converted to w:styles/w:style
text:list/@text:style-name translated to w:p/w:pPr/w:pStyle/@w:val

text:list-item is translated to a paragraph with w:pPr/w:numPr descendant set a follow : 
w:ilvi child is the item level starting at 0.
w:numId identifier is based on the relative position of this element's style.

Extra space characters text:c elements are injected into w:t elements by looking at the 
text:p or text:span following siblings
Tab character text:tab is translated to a run including a tabulation <w:r><w:tab/></w:r>
Line break text:line-break is translated to <w:r><w:br/><w:t/></w:r>

Sub Feature: Soft Hyphens, Hyphens, and Non-breaking Blanks
Comment: TODO : check this is really completed

Technical description: text:span @style-name treated
text:a is converted to w:hyperlink where attribute r:id is the result of the generate-id() function
TODO : see which one might be useful

Sub Feature: Example of an Index Entry Configuration

Technical description: table:table is converted to w:tbl.
table:table-row is converted to w:tr/w:trPr element
table:table-cell is converted to w:tc

table:table-column converted to w:gridCol
w:gridCol/@w:w is based on style:table-column-properties/@style:column-width for this column style name
/table/table:table-header-rows/table:table-row gets w:tblHeader tag in properties section

Sub Feature: Common Shape Attributes for Text and Spreadsheet Documents

Technical description:
Internal images only, ie [starts-with(draw:frame/draw:image/@xlink:href, 'Pictures/')]. Converted to w:drawing/wp:inline.
wp:extend attibutes @cx and @cx respectively use draw:frame/@svg:width and draw:frame/@svg:height and fail-safe with draw:text-box/@fo:min-width and draw:text-box/@fo:min-height

Sub Feature: Events with an Equivalent HTML Event Type
Declaring DDE Connections for Text Fields

Technical description:
office:document-styles/office:styles/style:default-style[@style:family='paragraph']/style:text-properties is translated to w:docDefaults/w:rPrDefault.
office:document-styles/office:styles/style:default-style[@style:family='paragraph']/style:paragraph-properties translated to w:docDefaults/w:pPrDefault.

style:font-face/@svg:font-family is converted to w:fonts/w:font/@w:name
One special case : 'StarSymbol' value is converted to 'Symbol'
style:font-face/@svg:font-family-generic is converted to w:fonts/w:font/w:family
style:font-face/@style:font-picth is converted to w:fonts/w:font/w:pitch

Sub Feature: Common Data Style Child Element Attributes

Technical description:
text:list-level-style-number is converted to w:lvl 
and w:lvl/@w:ilvi is based on text:list-level-style-number/@text:level.
If text:list-level-style-number/@text:start-value exists, it is converted to w:lvl/w:start/@w:val
Otherwise, it is set to value 1.
Attributes @style:num-prefix and @style:num-suffix along with @text:level are used to build w:lvl/w:lvlText/@w:val
Style property style:list-level-properties/@text:space-before defines w:lvl/w:pPr/w:ind/@w:left and style:list-level-properties/@text:min-label-width defines w:lvl/w:pPr/w:ind/@w:hanging. For both properties, conversion to twip (twentieth of a point) is required.
@style:num-format is converted to w:lvl/w:numFmt/@w:val

w:lvl/w:numFmt/@w:val set to 'bullet'
w:lvl/w:lvlText/@w:val set to "•"
w:lvl/w:lvlJc/@w:val set to "left"
Same indentation properties as for text:list-level-style-number
w:ilvi child is the item level starting at 0.
See Table Formatting Properties
style:text-properties/@fo:color used in w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:color/@w:val

style:text-properties/@style:font-name copied to 
/w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:rFonts/@w:ascii and @w:hAnsi attributes

style:style/@style:font-family converted to w:styles/w:style/@w:type
'text' family matches 'character' type.
'graphic', 'section' and 'paragraph' families match 'paragraph' type.

style:style[@fo:font-style='italic'] converted to w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:i
style:style[@fo:font-style-complex='italic'] converted to w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:i-cs

style:text-properties/@fo:font-size converted to w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/@w:sz
If fo:font-size is expressed in percentage of a parent font-size, we climb up the style ancestors until we find an absolute size (expressed in points). If none was found, the size of the default style (office:styles/style:default-style)  in the same family is used.
w:pPr/w:spacing based on style:paragraph-properties/@fo:line-height
ODF 'double' value only makes sense for OOX 'double' and 'wavyDouble'.
Comment: The translation might be lossy, because underline feature is richer in ODF than in OOX

Technical description:
style:style/@style:text-underline-style used in w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:u/@w:val
solid -> single
dotted -> dotted
dash -> dash
long-dash -> dashLong
dot-dash -> dotDash
dot-dot-dash -> dotDotDash
wave -> wave
otherwise 'single' is used.
Comment: The translation might be lossy, because underline feature is richer in ODF than in OOX

Technical description: ODF 'thick' or 'bold' values produce OOX *Heavy* underline style when it exists.
Comment: The translation might be lossy, because underline feature is richer in ODF than in OOX

Technical description:
style:style/@style:text-underline-color converted to w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:u/@w:color
'font-color' is converted to 'auto'
otherwise RGB values are parsed.

style:text-properties/@fo:font-weight translated to w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:b
style:text-properties/@fo:font-complex-weight translated to w:styles/w:style/w:rPr/w:b-cs

Sub Feature: Text Combine Start and End Characters

Technical description:
styles:paragraph-properties/@fo:line-height translated to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:spacing
@w:lineRule set to 'auto' if @w:line is expressed in percentage, otherwise, it is set to 'exact'. Attribute @w:line is the twip (twentieth of a point) measure of line-height

styles:paragraph-properties/@style:line-height-at-least translated to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:spacing
@w:lineRule set to 'atLeast' and @w:line is the twip measure of line-height

style:paragraph-properties/@fo:text-align converted to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:jc.Translated values are :
center -> center
start -> left
end -> right
justify -> both
otherwise start

style:paragraph-properties/style:tab-stops converted to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:tabs
style:paragraph-properties/style:tab-stops/style:tab-stop converted to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:tabs/w:tab
style:tab-stop/@fo:position converted to w:tab/@w:pos
style:tab-stop/@style:type converted to w:tab/@w:val. When @style:type is not present, @w:val is set to 'clear'

style:paragraph-properties/@fo:left-margin and style:paragraph-properties/@fo:right-margin are 
respectively translated to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:ind/@w:left and w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:ind/@w:right (Convertion to twip units is required).

style:paragraph-properties/@fo:left-margin and style:paragraph-properties/@fo:right-margin are 
respectively translated to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:ind/@w:left and w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:ind/@w:right (Convertion to twip units is required).

style:paragraph-properties/@fo:margin-top converted to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:spacing/@w:before
style:paragraph-properties/@fo:margin-right converted to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:spacing/@w:after

style:paragraph-properties/@fo:background-color translated to w:styles/w:style/w:pPr/w:shd/@w:fill
Attribute @w:val is set to 'solid'

The table style name table:table/@table:style-name is set to w:tbl/w:tblPr/w:tblStyle/@w:val.
style:table-properties/@style:width for this table style name is converted to w:tbl/w:tblPr/w:tblW/@w:w
w:tc/w:tcPr/w:shd is based on @fo:background-color

w:tc/w:tcMar/w:top is based on @fo:padding or @fo:padding-top (whether defined or not) attribute found in style:table-cell-properties. 
w:tc/w:tcMar/w:top/@w:type is set to 'dxa'
The same applies to the elements w:bottom, w:right and w:left
